Knowledge.description: Some destructible objects have vulnerabilities other than those which the player is informed of. For example, Power Bomb can be used to open charge beam doors. Enabling this trick may require players to apply this knowledge in order to progress.

Movement.description: A broad category for non-obvious movement which can't easily be classified using other tricks. Players may be expected to perform precise jumps and other niche movement optimizations.

Combat.description: If this trick is enabled, the player may be expected to defeat enemies and bosses with fewer items and less health.

IBJ.description: By chaining and timing bomb jumps it`s possible to gain infinite height.

UBJ.description: Bomb Jump technique that allows for climbing submerged places without Gravity Suit.

SWJ.description: By shooting right after a Wall Jump, it is possible to jump up a single wall all the way up.

Walljump.description: By Spin Jumping into a wall and then pressing jump again, Samus performs a Wall Jump, which can be used to gain height. Higher difficulties expect more difficult variations.

Heatrun.description: You can run through heat rooms without a suit. It depends on your health how long you can stay in these rooms.

DBoost.description: Most enemies will knock you away when Samus gets damaged. This can be used to get momentum over ledges.

FrozenEnemy.description: After you receive the Ice Beam you´ll be able to freeze some enemies in place allowing you to reach certain spots.

SpiderClip.description: There are gaps in the collision that connect solid tiles to breakable blocks and pedestals. By Spider Balling over these gaps and rotating the Circle Pad in its direction, Samus can latch onto the wrong side of them and clip out of bounds.

IceClip.description: By freezing certain enemies a small distance from walls, Samus can clip through the walls or floor by jumping in the gap between the wall and the frozen enemy.

PhaseClip.description: Samus can clip through walls if she stands on a crumble block with Phase Drift active, grabbing an adjacent ledge, and deactivate Phase Drift mid-climb.

MeleeClip.description: With a specific setup, Samus can clip through walls that are two tiles high using the Melee.

DBJ.description: An interation of the Infinite Bomb Jump that allows for crossing horizontal gaps using Bombs.

UnmorphExtend.description: By performing a spin jump, morphing in midair at the peak of the jump, then unmorphing, Samus can gain extra height.

PhaseSkip.description: This trick expects crossing consecutive crumble blocks without Phase Drift. This can be done with precise jumps or specific positioning and timing using Bombs, depending on the room.

AirMorph.description: Jump and enter Morph Ball while in the air.

SuperJump.description: By rapidly double tapping jump within a few frames, Samus can jump higher than normal.

Spider Boost.description: By Spider Balling on a wall and laying a Power Bomb, it's possible to get propelled into a straight line and cover large distances. Every use that the vanilla game expects is ranked at Beginner.

OoB.description: Movement done after clipping Out of Bounds.

Freeze.description: By abusing how the Melee works, this trick can be used to freeze enemies for the full freeze timer without having Charge Beam.

PreciseAiming.description: With specific angles and movement, it is possible to shoot objects normally out of reach while in Free Aim. This can also allow for shooting Out of Bounds.

MissilelessMetroids.description: This trick accounts for fighting Metroids without Missiles or Super Missiles.

Dodge.description: Movement required to avoid fighting enemies in the way of Samus.

HazardRun.description: Purposefully tanking damage from hazards to bypass requirements. Hazards include Acid, Fleech Swarms, and Red Plants.

Climb Rooms Vertically (No High Jump, No.display_name: Climb Rooms Vertically (No High Jump, No IBJ)

data.comment: Break the shield (Regenerates once per fight)
Break the shield (Regenerates once per fight)
Removing the Larva if grabbed or dodge it
Use Phase Drift to extend freeze timer
Quickly jump off enemy while it's temporarily frozen

Deal with Black Gravitt in Low Ceiling.display_name: Deal with Black Gravitt in Low Ceiling

data.comment: Spin Jump over the Gravitt when it lunges

minimal_logic.description: Items checked for: Morph Ball, Bomb, Spider Ball, Space Jump, and Metroid DNA.
